General_Description: '''The Peloponnesian League''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Peering through the billowing smoke of war were the red eyes of [[Cult of Kosmos|the Cultists']] [[Peloponnesian League (Cult of Kosmos)|Peloponnesian League]], a small group that would stop at nothing to turn all [[Greece|Greeks]] into [[Sparta]]n slaves.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra eliminated every member of the Cult's Peloponnesian League branch. By doing so she obtained the [[Spartan War Hero Set|Spartan War Hero]] [[Armor|armor set]], the [[Xiphos of Dionysos]], and a clue to the [[Aspasia|identity]] of the Ghost of Kosmos.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
